name: Uni Work - Top Down Shooter
description:
Controlse 

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse - Fire Shot

Right Mouse - Use Power

1 & 2 - Select Power

This is my first-year submission for intro to scripting.

For this game I wanted to combine the gameplay elements of Dishonard and Hotline Miami, the main elements I wanted to take from Dishonard was stealth and a variety of powers as well as branching pathways and from Hotline Miami I took the topdown perspective and fail and retry gameplay,.
